verdict.summary: Network connection or operation timed out.

dead_ends.action: Increase timeout to very large value
dead_ends.why_fails: Just delays the failure, doesn't fix the network issue
Process hangs forever on unreachable hosts

workarounds.action: Add retry with exponential backoff for transient failures
Verify target host is reachable: DNS, firewall, port

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'TimeoutError' is a network_error error while 'ssl.SSLCertVerificationError' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
